txt.en: The Silkenhold is guarded by the presence of great evil....
The Silkenhold is guarded by three very old and evil spider-mistresses.
The Silkenhold is guarded by three very old and evil spider-mistresses.
The Silkenhold can be found in the northern reaches of the Eaves of Fangorn.\n\nYou should search the Silkenhold for the evil mistresses that have overtaken the trees.

The Huorn bristles with pleasure as you relay the events of your battles against the three great spider-mistresses of the Silkenhold. The forest here will be safer now without them spreading their evil light-smothering brood across the forest.
The three mistresses of the Silkenhold can be found throughout that spider-infested stretch of forest.\n\nYou should defeat the three mistresses of the Silkenhold.

The distressed Huorn is at the foot of some stony steps leading up into the Silkenhold in northern Fangorn.\n\nYou should return to the Huorn and tell him that you have defeated the evil mistresses of the Silkenhold, and that there is little to fear now.
Defeat the great spiders of the Silkenhold
